price: 这只是今世的享受，然后他们只归于我，然后，我将因他们不信道而使他们尝试严厉的刑罚。
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun fī al-dun'yā thumma ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma nudhīquhumu al-ʿadhāba al-shadīda bimā kānū yakfurūna
